snippet: John Concepcion was about to retire as a building superintendent when major surgery and more than $250,000 in doctors’ bills dashed his plans.
abstract: Community Service Society provides John Concepcion of Brooklyn with money to pay some of his bills after major surgery left him with over $250,00 in medical charges.
lead_paragraph: John Concepcion was about to retire as a building superintendent when major surgery and more than $250,000 in doctors’ bills dashed his plans.

headline.print_headline: Medical Bills Crush Brooklyn Man’s Hope of Retiring
